long_description: The Jones 30L snowboard backpack lets you bring along a little more on those backcountry missions. Carry board vertically or use cross-carry system to haul board horizontally against your back for optimal balance and even weight distribution. Side ski carry of splitboard keeps weight close to your back. Front zip pocket accommodates avalanche tools and gear. Zip back entry to main compartment (behind back panel padding) ensures easy access to your gear, even when your board is attached. Compartment for hydration reservoir (sold separately); insulated shoulder pads prevent frozen hose and ensure easy hydration on long treks. Padded hipbelt features a zip pocket on each side; stow snacks and small essentials.
short_description: The Jones 30L snowboard backpack lets you bring along a little more on those backcountry missions.
